item.title: Jesse add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Jesse add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "So many vows... they make you swear and swear. Defend the king. Obey the king. Keep his secrets. Do his bidding. Your life for his. But obey your father. Love your sister. Protect the innocent. Defend the weak. Respect the gods. Obey the laws. It’s too much. No matter what you do, you’re forsaking one vow or the other." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Neil Gaiman
Jesse add a quote by John Steakley
item.description: "You are What you do When it counts" - Armor" -- John Steakley

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Robert Jordan
item.description: "Any fool knows men and women think differently at times, but the biggest difference is this. Men forget, but never forgive; women forgive, but never forget." -- Robert Jordan

item.title: Jesse add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Bran thought about it. 'Can a man still be brave if he's afraid?' 'That is the only time a man can be brave,' his father told him." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jesse add a quote by George R.R. Martin
Jesse add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Austin Grossman
item.description: "If you're different you always know it, and you can't fix it even if you want to" -- Austin Grossman

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Austin Grossman
item.description: "What do you do when you find out your heart is the wrong kind? You take what you're given, and be the hero you can be. Hero to your own cold, inverted heart." -- Austin Grossman

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman
